name: nfsbc1
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))

|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
